participant_1.background:
I love to be active and look my best, but I can get sad when I lose a loved one.
i work as a veterinarian.
i own four german shepherds.
i like meat too much.
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.

participant_2.background:
I trust God to help me stay healthy, even when I am too busy to take care of myself.
and , my best friend is cayden.
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
I don't bike as much as my family but I love to curl up with a good book.
I wear clothes that make me look more youthful.

content.text: I am well thanks for asking! Are you doing well?
I'm doing well too, thank you!
Good to hear! What's your favorite book?
I don't really have a favorite book. I like to read a lot of different types of books.
That's awesome! I like to read a lot too. I'm currently reading a book about the history of the United States.
That sounds really interesting! I've never been a big history buff, but I'm sure it's a good book.
Thanks! It's actually a really good book. I'm learning a lot about the history of our country.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! What do you do for a living?
That's awesome! I love animals! I have a dog and a cat.
Aww, that's so cute! I love animals too. I have four German shepherds.
That's a lot of dogs! I bet they're really cute.
They are! They're the best dogs ever.
